Seasoned Healthcare Leader Brings Strategic Vision and Deep Market Expertise to Accelerate Growth and Drive Patient-Centered Innovation

MIAMI, Aug. 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Lavior, a leader in advanced healing solutions, proudly announces the appointment of Ryan Shilling as Vice President of Sales, U.S. Market. With more than 15 years of leadership experience across healthcare sectors, Shilling brings a proven track record of driving strategy, cultivating high-performing teams, and delivering measurable outcomes in complex care environments.

Shilling's background spans a broad spectrum of healthcare domains, including personal care, hospice and end-of-life services, home health, and federal and state healthcare programs. His expertise in physician procurement, post-acute care, and hospitality further underscores his ability to navigate evolving systems and design solutions that enhance both clinical and operational performance.

"Ryan's strategic mindset and passion for improving access to high-quality care make him an invaluable addition to our executive team," said Gilad Savion, CEO of Lavior. "His deep understanding of publicly funded healthcare, coupled with his results-oriented leadership, will play a critical role as we expand our presence and deepen our impact in the U.S. market."

Throughout his career, Shilling has been at the forefront of business development, building enduring partnerships that advance care delivery and foster innovation. Known for his collaborative approach, he is uniquely positioned to help Lavior deliver on its mission: elevating healing through innovation, compassion, and measurable outcomes.

"I'm proud to join Lavior's mission to put patients first and drive meaningful change in wound care across the country, especially at a time when healing outcomes matter more than ever and we have the opportunity to truly reshape patient care." said Shilling. "Together, we have the opportunity to redefine what patient-centered healing looks like, delivering solutions that not only drive better results, but do so with empathy, purpose, and long-term sustainability."

In his new role, Shilling will focus on scaling Lavior's U.S. operations, expanding market access, and aligning sales strategy with evolving provider and payer needs in an increasingly outcomes-based environment.
